mapper.insert: insert ignore into success_info(miaosha_id, user_phone) values (#{miaoshaId},#{userPhone})
mapper.select: select si.miaosha_id, si.user_phone, si.create_time, si.state, ms.miaosha_id "miaosha.miaosha_id", ms.name "miaosha.name", ms.number "miaosha.number", ms.start_time "miaosha.start_time", ms.end_time "miaosha.end_time", ms.create_time "miaosha.create_time", from success_info si inner join miaosha ms on si.miaosha_id = ms.miaosha_id where si.miaosha_id = #{miaoshaId};
